channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SUREFIRE-1322] Surefire and Failsafe should dump critical errors in dump file and console
item.description:
Both plugins, Surefire and Failsafe, dump stack trace and error messages and lost commands in dump file or in console:
[date]-jvmRun[N].dump,
[date].dumpstream and
[date]-jvmRun[N].dumpstream
IN previous versions the plugins threw exceptions like, MojoExecutionException and MojoFailureException, but the user could not see any message of error which killed the plugin internally.
Since now this is possible and the user can see the dump files in target
target/failsafe-reports and target/surefire-reports.
item.summary: Surefire and Failsafe should dump critical errors in dump file and console

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
